origin.cursedorigins.minotaur.name: Minotaur
origin.cursedorigins.minotaur.descriptio: Forget ass eat grass! Originating from the Belgian Cow, you are a force to be reckoned within the lawn mowing industry.
power.cursedorigins.mow_hay.name: Mow Hay
power.cursedorigins.mow_hay.description: You are able to eat grass and variants of grass while not holding anything in your main hand.
power.cursedorigins.delicious_dairy.name: Delicious Dairy
power.cursedorigins.delicious_dairy.desc: You and other players can milk you with a bucket.
power.cursedorigins.status_immunity.name: Calcium
power.cursedorigins.status_immunity.desc: You are immune to all status effects.
power.cursedorigins.cake_is_a_lie.name: The Cake is a Lie
power.cursedorigins.cake_is_a_lie.descri: You can't digest normal sources of food.
